activities: This certification covers transfers of personal data relating to individuals employed by PopCap. PopCap collects, uses and discloses employee personal data for business and employment purposes, including without limitation: (i) hiring/onboarding new employees; (ii) training; (iii) planning and implementing employee transfers; (iii) managing employees from another country; (iv) conducting performance evaluations and salary, bonus, and other employee reviews; (v) making compensation decisions and issuing compensation; (vi) satisfying governmental reporting, audit and tax requirements; (vii) for security, health; and safety reasons; (viii) planning and implementing acquisitions and mergers; (ix) to implement and maintain our information technology systems; (x) for employee benefits administration; and (xi) for other employment-related and business-related purposes permitted and/or required under applicable local law and regulation.
